## Libraries
```{r}
library(party)
library(rpart)
library(treeheatr)
```

## Arrange the data
Manually create a class (as factor) column with the desired classification. Needs "resKR"
```{r}
data <- cbind(data.frame(class = as.factor(NA)), sub.coredata)


```

## Parameters
```{r}

predictors <- paste(colnames(data), collapse="+")
fmla <- as.formula(paste("class", predictors,sep="~"))


```
